CustomField.description: When checked, Items linked to this Item Class may only be purchased if they are the direct child of a "Registration" record related to an "Active" Event. Defaults unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, Items linked to this Item Class may only be purchased if they are the direct child of a "Registration" record related to an "Active" Event. Defaults unchecked.
CustomField.label: Is Event Session
